titles.title: Sludge Disclosure Act of 2005
To require information on the contents of sludge to be provided to purchasers of the sludge and the public.
Sludge Disclosure Act of 2005

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: Sludge Disclosure Act of 2005 - Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to require any person who sells or transfers sludge from a waste treatment plant for agricultural or related purposes to disclose to purchasers and the public information on the source and content of such sludge.
